## Not scaled variables
### Total inversions model

```{r, include=FALSE}
# Inversion type
yVar<-"invCategory"

# Scaled/notScaled
xVars<- "Length.Mb + allRepCounts + Color + WAvgRate.perMb + ChromType" 

# Formula
myFormula<-paste0(yVar,"~", xVars)
xVarsVector<-strsplit(xVars, " [+] ")[[1]]

# Samples for prediction
samples<-data.frame(vars=xVarsVector, sam=c(50,4,0,4, 0), names=c(NA,"Low, Med-low, Med-high, High", "centromeric, arm, telomeric", "Low, Med-low, Med-high, High", NA), stringsAsFactors = F )

# Pass to file
save(yVar,xVars,myFormula,xVarsVector,samples , file= "data/analysisParams.RData")
```


```{r child = '03invAnalysis.Rmd'}
```
